PHP Manual

hw_api_attribute->values

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api_attribute->values — Returns all values of the attribute

Description

hw_api_attribute
array values ( void )

Gets all values of the attribute.

Return Values

Returns an array of attribute values.
